title: Sei Juushi Bismarck (Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs)
synopsis: In the distant future, humanity has explored beyond Earth and colonized both the inner and outer planets of the Solar System. In order to protect the colonies and maintain law and order in the solar system, the Earth Federation Government (EFG) was created. Soon, many settlers started to resent the EFG's and its sphere of influence, straining the relationship between the central government and the colonies.
voices: ['Shioya, Yoku', 'Shimada, Bin', 'Koujiro, Chie', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Suzuoki, Hirotaka', 'Katou, Seizou', 'Kojima, Toshihiko', 'Hirabayashi, Shouzou', 'Tsukase, Noriko', 'Suzuoki, Hirotaka']
staff: [['Annou, Masami', ['Director']], ['Itou, Tsunehisa', ['Script']], ['MIQ', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Ohira, Shinya', ['In-Between Animation']]]
